# ciscoise_trustsec_vn_bulk_update (Data Source)

It performs create operation on virtualNetwork.

- Update Virtual Network in bulk

## Example Usage

```terraform

  provider = ciscoise
  payload {

    additional_attributes = "string"
    id                    = "string"
    last_update           = "string"
    name                  = "string"
  }
}
```
